suite.name: CreateCharacters

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/accounts path_url=/accounts headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '39', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "lucas.pdsantos11@gmail.com"}'

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: DELETE
kw.msg: DELETE Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/delorean path_url=/delorean headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '61300d22874ab200165f08e3', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None

kw.name: Factory TonyStark
kw.msg: &{personagem} = { name=Tony Stark | aliases=Homem de Ferro | age=45 | team=Vingadores | active=False }

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '61300d22874ab200165f08e3', 'Content-Length': '101', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Tony Stark", "aliases": "Homem de Ferro", "age": 45, "team": "Vingadores", "active": false}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '61300d22874ab200165f08e3', 'Content-Length': '100', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Peter Parker", "aliases": "Homem Aranha", "age": 25, "team": "Vingadores", "active": true}'

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '61300d22874ab200165f08e3', 'Content-Length': '100', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Peter Parker", "aliases": "Homem Aranha", "age": 25, "team": "Vingadores", "active": true}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

suite.doc: Suite de Teste do cadastro de personagens na API da Marvel
